metadata.synopsis: Player has fought and defeated an infernal creature that was masqeurading as an ox.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Fight and kill the infernal creature masquerading as an ox in the stables of the last light inn.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Perhaps next time we shouldn't poke the mysterious ox.

2.speaker: Player
2.text: Perhaps. But that's certainly a fight I won't soon forget.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: I don't think I'll ever look at an ox quite the same.
